title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: Responsible for implementing the user interface and user experience of web applications, ensuring a visually appealing and interactive user-facing side of the software.

title: Junior Backend Developer
description: Responsible for developing server-side infrastructure and logic that enables the functionality and data processing of web applications.

title: Junior App Developer
description: Responsible for developing new features in One Stop and other mobile application that SWC aims to release in the next years.

title: Junior Product Designer
description: Responsible for developing innovative and user-centered designs for products, balancing aesthetics, functionality, and usability.

title: Junior Product Manager
description: Responsible for managing projects, acting like a bridge between the developers and designers
